title: Drawing, 1997-19-388, after 1980
medium: Red, blue and black marker; yellow, white and green colored pencil; graphite on white tracing paper
inscribed: Two red lines, one "L" shaped at left center.
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Design for Motorama/DragonOil. Design layout at right center of sheet comprising of red rectangle with black ruled lines and white circle with the captial letter M in black at center. Oval above in yellow and yellow-green with MOTORAMA in black at center, horizontally. Dragonoil in white and black along right side, outlined in green. Markers applied to verso of sheet.
